org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth

Class BluetoothLeWriteProvider<T extends Data>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.core.Provider<T,S>
      • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.core.AndroidProvider<T,S>
        • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth.BluetoothLeProvider<T,VoidData>
          • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth.BluetoothLeWriteProvider<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the input data

    public abstract class BluetoothLeWriteProvider<T extends Data>
extends BluetoothLeProvider<T,VoidData>
    BluetoothLeProvider that writes to the given GATT server, service and characteristic when executed and calls onWrite(BluetoothGatt, BluetoothGattCharacteristic, int) when the operation is completed.
    Author:
    Riccardo Mancini

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  BluetoothLeWriteProvider.BluetoothWriteProviderGattCallback
      Custom callback that calls onWrite(BluetoothGatt, BluetoothGattCharacteristic, int) at BluetoothGattCallback.onCharacteristicWrite(BluetoothGatt, BluetoothGattCharacteristic, int).
